text: They say lightning never strikes twice, but Black Lightning is coming back for Season 2 this fall. The CW's non - Arrowverse superhero series enjoyed an electrifying first year, and it set up some epic confrontations for the upcoming sophomore season. Here's everything we know about Black Lightning Season 2. When does it premiere? The Season 2 premiere, titled ` ` The Book of Consequences : Rise of the Green Light Babies,'' will air on The CW on Tuesday, October 9 at 9PM. It will be followed by a new episode on subsequent Tuesdays. Which characters and actors are in Season 2? Cress Williams will return as the titular superhero.
